rule.name: CASE_APP_AdhocTaskingTrackingGridDirect
rule.description: Takes in a adhoc tasking value directly and displays in a grid for tracking
rule.definition: load( local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex: 1, batchSize: 20, sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "id", ascending: true ) ), with( local!datasubset: todatasubset(ri!taskingData, local!pagingInfo), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label: ri!gridLabel, instructions: ri!gridInstructions, totalCount: local!datasubset.totalCount, columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Owner", field: "Assignees", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "Assignees", {}) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Name", field: "Name", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "Name", {}) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Request", field: "Request", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "Request", {}) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Status", field: "Status", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "Status", {}) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Deadline", field: "Deadline", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "Deadline", {}) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Completed", field: "Completed", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "Completed", {}) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Comment", field: "CompletedComments", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "CompletedComments", {}) ) }, value: local!pagingInfo, saveInto: local!pagingInfo ) ) )
